name: Perfect Temperature
description:
Played completely using mouse and arrow keys.

You can throw your net by clicking somewhere in the circle surrounding spoons the cat. 

the higher or lower your temperature is, the more rare and expensive the fish are. 

Be careful, because if you hit the top or bottom you may overheat or freeze!

There are 15 different fish to catch, and all of them are made by goopsuop!

you can upgrade your weight and floaties using the coins you collect, these will help prevent you from hitting the top and bottom of the screen.

Up and Down arrows will change the temperature, but the Left and Right will help spoons swim.
